title: Agbe
author: Agbe
created_time: May 11, 2022, 06:50:22 PMLast edit: May 23, 2022, 06:36:57 PM by Agbe
content: Bitcointalk Education CenterUniversity is Originated from Universe, means vast. Therefore It is a place or educational setting in which people dwell to learn and acquire vast knowledge. Bitcointalk is a place where people came to learn different crypto currencies in various Boards. But there are two major Faculties (Boards) in the Bitcointalk University. Which are: 1. Bitcoin2. Politics 1. Bitcoin is the Main course of the University (Bitcointalk). Under the Bitcoin Faculty, there are sub courses to learn. Which are:1. Development & Technical Discussion2. Mining3. Marketplace4. Economics etcThese are departments (Boards) in the forum and there are child Boards under these above mentioned. 2. Politics. Under politics. There are: 1. Meta2. Politics & Society3. Beginners & HelpThere are other Boards under here but these are the Main ones. Please understand my point I Know why I choose these two Boards as the main two Faculties (Boards), though there are a lot of Boards from English to local boards but whatever Board you discussed, you discuss either Economy or politics. Â Example: If you are discussing about Mining, Trading, Marketing and Bitcoin as a whole, it is all about Economics. And the Same thing with Politics, when you discuss about a country adoption of Bitcoin, and that becomes Political Economy which under Politics. For the clear understanding.. In English language, there are many types of Noun but all the kinds of Noun can be fused into two. Concrete Noun and Abstract Noun. Anything you mention as a NOUN is under any of the above. So as it is said, all the other Boards are under these two Boards in the forum

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: This is very funny to read, well it entertaining to an extent and you have done well in putting a smile on someone's face after going through a busy day, but in my own view i will prefer to categorize the faculty into Bitcoin and altcoins as the two available ones while Bitcoin is the major and most recognized faculty, also i will like to assume beginners and help section to be as an help and support line where you could get information on general aspect of cryptocurrency, bitcoin discussion is the major course of study while trading discussion is the second and economics is the third, Meta could represent the senate building, while reputation as student affairs, gambling could be the football pitch, just to mention few, as I've said earlier, his is fun to ease the stress of the day.
